scripts.dev: bun run dev:web & bun run dev:server
scripts.db:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up
scripts.db:migrate: cd packages/db && npx drizzle-kit generate && npx drizzle-kit migrate
scripts.build: bun run build:web && bun run build:server
scripts.start: bun run start:web && bun run start:server
